mapper.insert: insert into withdraw_notify_request (sign_type, sign, mer_id, version, order_id, mer_date, trade_no, amount, trade_state, transfer_date, transfer_settle_date, ret_code, ret_msg, request_time, response_time, request_data, response_data) values (#{signType}, #{sign}, #{merId}, #{version}, #{orderId}, #{merDate}, #{tradeNo}, #{amount}, #{tradeState}, #{transferDate}, #{transferSettleDate}, #{retCode}, #{retMsg}, #{requestTime}, #{responseTime}, #{requestData}, #{responseData})
